resources.string: Short click on the sound plays it. If the sound is playing, another short click on any sound will stop it. Long click is used to download the sound.
All rights on the pictures and audio belong to:
I am just a student and a big fan of Hirohiko Araki. This app is only my hobby, I earn almost nothing from it. But if you want to support me directly, here is my WMZ
First aid when smth is bugged. Wait till the end of the process. You will get the notification.
There are two easter eggs you can find with a search bar, the one is pewdiepie, another is holo.
The first load will take some time, as the database creates references for the further usage. Please be patient about it and wait till the end of the process!
